model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: When is your first music concert this summer?

MEMORY:
User Description:
Speaker A was born in Brazil and likes going to museums. They used to live in Los Angeles and loved the food there. Speaker A enjoys Disney music and could eat lengua tacos all day, everyday. They think sauerkraut is important. Speaker A has no Profile and Preference information available.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A and Speaker B have a friendly relationship, sharing their love for music and different food preferences. They engage in conversations about their favorite bands and songs, showing a level of comfort and familiarity.

Event Description:
Speaker A bought tickets to the Museum of Art of São Paulo and plans to go next week with their boyfriend. They look forward to shopping, enjoying the nightlife, and having refreshing beers by the beach. Speaker B recommends visiting the Museum of Art of São Paulo and mentions the variety of beaches in São Paulo. They also discuss shopping options and bargains in the city.
